title: Who dies in Hollyoaks after deadly stunt airs?
text:
More drama and disaster as Hollyoaks airs a deadly stunt (Pictures: Lime Pictures)

It’s all kicking off once again on Hollyoaks as the soap’s infamous stunt week continues.

We’ve already seen Tony (Nick Pickard) try desperately to escape the murderous Breda’s (Moya Brady) clutches.

A cliffhanger earlier this week saw Tony trying to escape from Breda’s car as she drove him back to town from where she’d been holding him captive.

This distracted her to the point that she crashed her car into a crane, which in turn has set a dangerous series of events into motion…

Does anyone die in dangerous Hollyoaks stunt week?

We cannot confirm who will live and who will die during stunt week, but we do know that several Hollyoaks locals have been put in danger.

As if Breda crashing her car into the crane wasn’t enough drama for our nerves, a distraught Luke (Gary Lucy) unintentionally caused even more chaos when he, devastated in the knowledge that Cindy (Stephanie Waring) knew that he was DJ’s real father all along, drunkenly climbed into the digger.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Girders then came crashing down to earth and into the florists in which Scott (Ross Adams) and Mitchell (Imran Adams) were secretly kissing..

The beams also crashed a little too close for comfort for Mandy (Sarah Jayne Dunn) and Yaz (Haiesha Mistry) before the whole digger eventually came tumbling down through the ground as underground tunnels collapsed right where Nancy (Jessica Fox) and Darren (Ashley Taylor Dawson) were looking for the then-missing Charlie (Charlie Behan) and Ella (Erin Palmer).

On the subject of Luke’s revelation, actor Gary said: ‘It completely spins him out. He feels a whole mix of emotions, he feels betrayed by Ollie and Cindy. As a father, I can relate to how heartbreaking it must feel to have lost out on all of the times with baby DJ, the big moments.’

On top of all that, would Luke ever be able to cope with the guilt that would come if his climbing into the digger resulted in someone’s tragic demise?

Hollyoaks continues tonight at 7pm on E4.

MORE: Hollyoaks spoilers: A horrifying disaster leaves several residents for dead

MORE: Hollyoaks spoilers: James Nightingale plots revenge as Harry Thompson is laid to rest

description: It's all kicking off once again on Hollyoaks as the soap's infamous stunt week continues. Could death be looming after the crane collapse?
